## Specificity and Sensitivity of tests

The idea is to quickly understand what being tested *positive* or *negative* actually mean.

Based on [Confusion Matrix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sensitivity_and_specificity)

Example: test's metrics for the [first FDA-approved test for Covid-19](https://twitter.com/zbinney_NFLinj/status/1245789672833417217?s=20)
